A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A fresh take on the franchise that doesn't pander to nostalgic sentimentalities. Structured around a strong narrative  : a chase and a show-down. Featuring character dynamics taylored to generation Y and their yearning for validity. Unpatronizing in its treatment of the star wars legacy. A movie with \"good-bones\" that will at least take you on a great visual journey.
